Title: ADNOC buys stake in NextDecade’s Rio Grande, pens 20-year LNG offtake agreement
Description: ADNOC has purchased a 11.7% equity stake in Phase 1 of NextDecade’s proposed 27 mtpa Rio Grande LNG plant in Brownsville, Texas and entered into a 20-year offtake agreement for 1.9 mtpa of LNG from the facility’s fourth train.
Author: JS

Title: LNG exports from Bintulu seen picking up after halt in shipments last week
Description: Shipments from the Petronas-operated 29.2 mtpa Bintulu LNG export facility in Malaysia resumed at the end of last week following a four-day export halt after the facility lost power on May 10.  And they are expected to pick up this week.
Author: CK

Title: Technical issue at Alexandroupolis LNG still unresolved, holds back commercial start
Description: A technical issue continues to hold back the start of commercial operations at Greece’s second LNG receiving terminal, the Gastrade-operated 4 mtpa Alexandroupolis LNG, with it unclear when this will be resolved and when the terminal will receive its second LNG cargo.
Author: CK
